snippet: Jameer Nelson of the Magic has not been an efficient shooter this season, but history indicates he can recover.
abstract: Jameer Nelson of the Magic has not been an efficient shooter this season, but history indicates he can recover.
lead_paragraph: While the shadow of Dwight Howard's trade request hangs over the Orlando Magic, Coach Stan Van Gundy has a few more specific items worthy of his immediate attention.

headline.main: A Slow Start for the Magic's Nelson, but He Has Been There Before
